dependencies-comments.@actions/core: A runtime library for GitHub Actions that provides access to inputs such as the GitHub token.
dependencies-comments.@actions/github: A runtime library for GitHub Actions that provides access to the GitHub REST API via Octokit.
dependencies-comments.tslib: A runtime library that optimises TypeScript applications when the `importHelpers` option is enabled in `tsconfig.json`.
dependencies-comments.undici: An HTTP client that implements the Fetch API on Node.js. It is a peer dependency of `@actions/core` and `@actions/github`.
dependencies-comments.zod: Zod; a TypeScript-based data validation library.

devDependencies-comments.@octokit/types: Type definitions for the GitHub REST API via Octokit.
devDependencies-comments.@rainstormy/updraft: Updraft is a release automation tool.
devDependencies-comments.@types/eslint: Type definitions for ESLint configuration files.
devDependencies-comments.@types/prettier: Type definitions for Prettier configuration files.
devDependencies-comments.@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin: An ESLint plugin that uncovers issues in TypeScript code. It must always match the version of `@typescript-eslint/parser`.
devDependencies-comments.@typescript-eslint/parser: An ESLint plugin that lets it parse TypeScript sources. It must always match the version of `@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin`.
devDependencies-comments.@vitest/coverage-v8: A Vitest plugin that reports code coverage.
devDependencies-comments.@vitest/ui: A Vitest plugin that provides a test overview in the web browser.
devDependencies-comments.concurrently: A tool that executes multiple Yarn script commands in parallel.
devDependencies-comments.eslint: ESLint; a static program analysis tool that uncovers issues in JavaScript code.
devDependencies-comments.eslint-plugin-eslint-comments: An ESLint plugin that uncovers issues in the use of ESLint comments.
devDependencies-comments.eslint-plugin-functional: An ESLint plugin that encourages principles from the functional programming paradigm.
devDependencies-comments.eslint-plugin-jest: An ESLint plugin that uncovers issues in test suites in Jest (and Vitest whose API is compatible with that of Jest).
devDependencies-comments.eslint-plugin-redundant-undefined: An ESLint plugin that uncovers inconsistencies in optional type declarations.
devDependencies-comments.eslint-plugin-unicorn: An ESLint plugin that complements the built-in set of rules.
devDependencies-comments.prettier-plugin-organize-imports: A Prettier plugin that sorts import statements and removes unused ones.
devDependencies-comments.simple-git-hooks: A tool that creates Git hooks from Yarn script commands.
devDependencies-comments.typescript: A statically typed programming language that extends the JavaScript syntax.

scripts.validate.fix: The formatter must run after the linter to resolve potential formatting issues introduced by the linter.
